Innovative education services

KBTU SCHOLARSHIP!
Master in Multimedia Technologies
1st time in Kazakhstan and CIS countries!

For the first time in CIS you have a possibility to become a certified specialist of "Multimedia Technologies" master's program

Contest of a short CG-video "Unleash your creativity"

KBTU announces a contest for talented creative people in the field of computer graphics for film or television.

Contest General Requirements

Contest "Unleash your creativity" provides participants with an opportunity to use their creative freedom within the framework of the contest task. Contest organizers are not intended by the young talents to create videos of their choice. All work must relate to the area of ​​three-dimensional animation, special effects for movies, commercials, motion-design, architectural visualization, and related fields. And the main thing is that this should be cool, stylish and powerful. It should be amazing and beat outright.

Contest works will be evaluated by the panel of judge and the best 7 works will be identified for a KBTU educational grant.

Participation in the contest is free. Results of the contest, revisions, awarding of the grant will be held on September 2013.

Both citizens of the Republic of Kazakhstan and international students can participate in the contest.

Creative Brief for the Competitor:

With every decision we change our future. (Richard Barch Davis)

  • Choice is the turning point of any story.
  • You are the creator of the best video clip in your life.
  • Your task is to tell a story about the choice that determines the fate of the protagonist. The story of the Choice of his own way.
    If one day you're going to create something great, remember - one day - is today. (Steven Spielberg)
  • There are no limits. Absolute freedom of expression.

Prizes:

  • 7 KBTU Scholarships to study at "Multimedia Technologies" master program.

Selection of Works

Screening of the judge will determine the high-quality, interesting and creative work. Members of the panel of judge will determine the work that will receive 100% grant for education.

Members of the panel of judge reserve the right not to include your video clip into the program without explanation.

Competition Dates

Round I - You can provide the material and application form from June 1 to August 1, 2013

Round II - Entrance exam is on August 15, 2013 and will select 7 best works. The winners, who will be awarded with grants, will be decided until September 2013.

The way of sending documents:

  • Fill in the application form
  • Name your profile using your own name
  • Send an e-mail with attached application form to: d.baibarakova@gmail.com
  • The method of delivery must be specified in the application form, showreel you can lay in ftp/http and reference it in the application form. If you do not have ftp we will give it to you, please include it in the e-mail. You can also send your disk by post or by e-mail to the address indicated in contacts with the note "contest - CG Grant KBTU». Post video clip to Youtube, Vimeo, and other services that provide videhosting services are prohibited.
  • The physical media provided DemoReel, will not be returned to the owner.

Requirements to Provided Materials

  • Production period from June 1 to August 1 2013.
  • Continuance is 3 minutes! This is important. Short video clips will take precedence over long!
  • 10 seconds "cap" must be included at the beginning of the video with the name and surname of the participant, as well as the name of CG-video.
  • The video should be submitted as a single file format QT MOV (preferably) or AVI (less desirable).
  • Resolution of 720 × 576 to 1280 × 800.
  • Video - Codec H.264, PhotoJpeg (less desirable - DivX codec or any standard).
  • Audio - stereo, 44 kHz, codec - no compression (less than desirable - any standard codec).
  • The total flow rate from 1 to 3 megabytes / second (if possible).
  • In the event of any deviation from this format of materials, be sure to report them to the letter, together with the application form.

The detailed information you can get by phone number: +7 (727) 272 44 64

Official website: http://ies.kbtu.kz
